block.p: 10 p.m. today to 5 a.m. tomorrow, and 10 p.m. Thursday to 5 a.m. Friday (ground spraying) Entire Town of Clarkstown, including the village of Upper Nyack and portions of the villages of Nyack and Spring Valley.

10 p.m. today to 5 a.m. tomorrow, and 10 p.m. Thursday to 5 a.m. Friday (ground spraying) Entire Town of Clarkstown, including the village of Upper Nyack and portions of the villages of Nyack and Spring Valley.
11:30 p.m. today to 4:30 a.m. tomorrow (ground spraying) Briarcliff Manor, Dobbs Ferry, Hastings, Town and Village of Ossining, and parts of southern White Plains not sprayed last Wednesday.
4:30 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. today (ground spraying) Point O Woods and Atlantique on Fire Island. 8 p.m. to 11:30 p.m. today (ground spraying) Bergen Point County Golf Course and surrounding communities.

FOR INFORMATION New York City (877) 968-4692 Nassau County (516) 571-2500 Suffolk County (631) 852-4939 Rockland County (845) 364-8990 Westchester County (914) 637-2420 Connecticut (860) 424-4184 Note: Spraying schedules are subject to change in the event of rain. (Source: Health departments)
